question: How can you access the state of a component from inside of a member function?
ReactJS is an MVC based framework?
Which of the following concepts is/are key to ReactJS?
What are the advantages of React JS?
answers: React can be used on client and as well as server side too
Using React increases readability and makes maintainability easier
React components have lifecycle events that fall into State/Property Updates
React can be used with any other framework as it is only a view layer
